Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited’s Investment Specialists’ Yashar Khalighi Personal Real Estate Corporation and Lawson Chu are pleased to present the opportunity to purchase 12500 Vickers Way in Richmond, British Columbia. The Subject Property is a freestanding industrial/retail building comprising of approximately 28,791 of rentable square footage on a lot size of 1.027 acres. It boasts approximately 167 feet of frontage to Vickers Way and 264 feet in depth. The Property has been extensively improved with over $500,000 worth of improvements in the last few years and hosts showroom tenancies. There are a total of four units varying from industrial warehouse to retail showrooms. There are grade loading doors at the rear of the Property along with a large paved lot area suitable for storage and additional parking. The property offers 12’ ceilings, heavy power, ample parking in front for tenants and visitors, and is sprinklered throughout. The Subject Property has flexible tenancies, presenting a partial owner-occupier, value add investment opportunity, and leasing opportunities.
